text.div:
R5 Subscription Notification Type Code System

Codes to represent types of notification bundles.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/subscriptions-backport/CodeSystem/backport-notification-type-code-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
handshake HandshakeThe notification is being sent as part of the setup or verification of a communications channel.
heartbeat HeartbeatThe notification is being sent because there has not been a notification generated over an extended period of time.
event-notification Event NotificationThe notification is being sent due to an event for the subscriber.
query-status Query StatusThe notification is being sent due to a client request or query for Subscription status.

name: BackportNotificationTypeCodeSystem
title: R5 Subscription Notification Type Code System
description: Codes to represent types of notification bundles.

concept.definition: The notification is being sent as part of the setup or verification of a communications channel.
The notification is being sent because there has not been a notification generated over an extended period of time.
The notification is being sent due to an event for the subscriber.
The notification is being sent due to a client request or query for Subscription status.
